reviews.text:
Great place, wonderful helpful  members of staff just book and go!
But if you are going there for a family fun day, then you might get annoyed with some people who wear a T-shirt in the pool very multicultural and some people are wearing their traditional outfits (women)
Please try not to swollen water at all.
Some visitors just like to manipulate the environment, they clean their children's noises etc.
Deep part of the pool edges full of sands.. I don't know why maybe some visitors (swimmers ) walk in with their sandals?
Once again, extremely helpful, great young  members of staff  üëè

It is a shame because this could be an excellent facility, but the management are greedy and underfunding and understaffing this excellent local asset. They schedule classes which make the pool inaccessible for anyone working full time, every evening and the entire weekend is dedicated to their money making classes. I have been unable to get a reply for over a month now from the Duty Manager asking them to swap my membership to a different centre or refund me due to lack of facilities. I hope they improve management of this space soon as it is very important for the local community.

Water damages still not fixed after nearly 3months. Reduced capacity/space as a result. None of the bikes were working for several days. No sign of any compensation, reduction in the monthly fee. Appaling.

--‚Äê---------------
Update after my last review 3 months ago; nothing has changed. Utter joke. Here are the pics showing the current state of the "gym". I have been very (too?) patient, time to cancel my membership.

---‚Äê--------------
Update 11/2022: I have finally cancelled my membership since the situation has still not improved and I was struggling to find any motivation to go to train in these circumstances. I have joined a new local gym earlier this week; ¬£26.99 instead of ¬£40 for the cheapest memebership at the leisure centre; brand new equipment, much more space, FREE use of the lockers (and they even gave me a lock ü§£)
It's a no brainer really.

Giving 1 star because gym is fixed up and working well.

However pool and sauna area is absolutely terrible. Changing rooms are dirty, shower is facing a toilet and bins so imagine the view and smell‚Ä¶ wood in sauna is rotten, some planks missing and broken, showers leaking, water refill station completely broken and dripping water non-stop, pool is dirty,small massage pool is broken for over a year now‚Ä¶ they really don‚Äôt care and membership is very expensive for what you get.

If god exists, he has forsaken the sauna and swimming pool in Archway Leisure Centre

Really disappointed and disgusted. Picture this in your mind ‚Ä¶.  you‚Äôre swimming peacefully, suddenly one of the life guard goes on break, after few minutes she gets back with three blue mop bucket, fill them up with the water DIRECTLY from the swimming pool. The add something looks like washing liquid and start cleaning somewhere near sauna, entry of the swimming area.  I don‚Äôt know how many breaches of infection prevention control this could represent. I‚Äôm not going to mention the small fecal matter found in the male changing room ‚Ä¶ first and last time.

address: 1 MacDonald Rd, Archway, London N19 5DD, United Kingdom
